column4: Hi, I'm running Ubuntu/windows on a Toshiba Satellite Pro A120 Laptop computer, when I plug my headphones into the jack on the front whilst running linux the speakers do not mute but when I plug the headphones in whilst running windows the speakers DO mute, therefore I beleive this is an issue with alsa and am wondering if there is a fix available?
can anyone help me with my headphone switch issue?
double click your volume control icon int he taskbar. then go to switches, then select "headphone jack sense"
double click your volume control icon int he taskbar. then go to switches, then select "headphone jack sense"
